text: Table 2: Scoring Systems for Predicting Immediate Outcome After Surgery for Ruptured Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm Glasgow Aneurysm Score Points Hardman Index Points Age of patient (points = no. of 1 Age > 76 1 yrs) Shock 17 Serum creatinine > 190 pmol/L 1 Myocardial disease 7 Haemoglobin < 9 g/dL 1 Cerebrovascular disease 10 Myocardial ischaemia on ECG 1 Renal disease 14 A history of loss of consciousness after arrival to 1 hospital
